name: Knightgineers
description:
Knightgineers is a local co-op tower defense game that is like overcooked mixed with bloons tower defense.

Play with Controller recommended.

Interact with O or B button on playstation and xbox controllers. You will first need to bind the controller in the game's settings page, once you start a level and pause. 

PC Controls

Controls

Player 1

Player 2

Move Up

W

I

Move Left

A

J

Move Down

S

K

Move Right

D

L

Move Interact

E

O
